sentence.english: She isn't working as an accountant anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ella ya no trabaja como contadora.

sentence.english: Are they auditioning for the new actor in the play?
sentence.spanish: ¿Hacen una audición para el nuevo actor en la obra?

sentence.english: She was serving passengers as an air hostess.
sentence.spanish: Ella servía a los pasajeros como azafata.

sentence.english: I'm not studying to become an architect.
I was painting landscapes as an artist.
Were you dreaming of being an astronaut as a child?
They are observing the stars as astronomers.
sentence.spanish: Ellos observan las estrellas como astrónomos.

sentence.english: Does he train like a professional athlete?
She wasn't writing her first book as an author.
sentence.spanish: Ella no escribía su primer libro como autora.

sentence.english: Are we hiring a baby-sitter for tonight?
He doesn't wake up early like a baker.
sentence.spanish: Él no se despierta temprano como un panadero.

sentence.english: Does he handle money as a cashier?
Does he create new recipes as a chef?
They are cleaning offices as cleaners.
She doesn't advise companies as a consultant.
sentence.spanish: Ella no asesora empresas como consultora.

sentence.english: They weren't studying medicine to become doctors.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no estudiaban medicina para ser médicos.

sentence.english: I was driving trucks as a driver.
Are we fixing wiring as electricians?
Were you designing bridges as an engineer?
Does she grow crops as a farmer?
Are we training to become firefighters?
She doesn't work with digital art as a graphic designer.
sentence.spanish: Ella no trabaja con arte digital como diseñadora gráfica.

sentence.english: She wasn't cutting hair as a hairdresser.
sentence.spanish: Ella no cortaba pelo como peluquera.

sentence.english: Is he reporting the news as a journalist?
He doesn't practice law as a lawyer anymore.
sentence.spanish: Él ya no ejerce la abogacía como abogado.

sentence.english: I was organizing books as a librarian.
Does she repair cars as a mechanic?
Does she perform in concerts as a musician?
She doesn't work night shifts as a nurse.
sentence.spanish: Ella no trabaja turnos de noche como enfermera.

sentence.english: Were you taking portraits as a photographer?
They weren't flying planes as pilots.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no volaban aviones como pilotos.

sentence.english: He doesn't repair pipes as a plumber.
sentence.spanish: Él no repara tuberías como fontanero.

sentence.english: She wasn't patrolling the streets as a police officer.
sentence.spanish: Ella no patrullaba las calles como policía.

sentence.english: They are writing code as programmers.
Is he serving in the army as a soldier?
Is he teaching mathematics as a teacher?
Were you translating documents as a translator?
They are serving tables as waiters.
They weren't publishing novels as writers.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no publicaban novelas como escritores.
